website_summaries.verdict: The Sony a7 III is an entry-level full-frame camera that goes well beyond the basics in features, with excellent image quality, 10fps subject tracking, and 4K video capture.
cons: Only one card slot is UHS-II
Shooting buffer must clear to start video

customer_reviews.title: A great camera, the reason why I switched to Sony
customer_reviews.text: I really admire Sony for releasing such a product which, even though is marketed as a basic camera, it has more features than some of the competition's pro cameras. One might think that Sony is not all about profit, like most companies are, and actually gives a damn about its clients. Sure, its menu system is a bit all over the place, but if you spend the time in the beginning to customize it to match your needs, then you don't ever need to go through the menu again. I love it and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Liviu Lungu

customer_reviews.title: Get one...... Get one ...
customer_reviews.text: Get one......Get one.......GET ONE! What a camera. Sony has nailed it with mirrorless technology, this is my third Sony body. Got rid of my pro Nikon, never looked back.

product_meta.title: Sony Alpha 7 III | Full-Frame Mirrorless Camera ( Fast 0.02s AF, 5-axis in-body optical image stabilisation, 4K HLG, Large Battery Capacity )
product_meta.description: Style Name:Camera BodyBack-illuminated 24.2MP full-frame sensor - The 35mm full-frame Exmor R CMOS image sensor features 24.2-megapixel resolution, back illumination, and gapless on-chip lens design for extraordinary sensitivity and dynamic range. Two times faster12 data readout speed is achieved through copper wires and front-end LSI. Entirely enhanced image processing system - A combination of new-generation image processing system and a new sensor achieves an up to 1.5-stop improvement in image quality. Wider, faster, more steadfast AF performance - An evolved image processing system and α9 camera AF algorithms optimised for the α7 III improve AF speed, precision, and tracking performance. Focal-plane phase-detection AF supports A-mount lenses - Phase-detection AF can operate even when an A-mount lens18 is mounted to the α7 III via an LA-EA3 adaptor. The 693-point focal-plane phase-detection AF system provides wide-area coverage, fast response, and high-performance tracking.
feature_bullets: RESPONSIVE AUTOFOCUS: rely on Real Time tracking and Eye AF (human/animal) to keep your subject sharp in any situation.
BREATHTAKING IMAGE QUALITY: 24 Mp full frame sensor paired with high ISO capabilities to deliver outstanding images even in low light.
STEADY SHOOTING: 5-axis optical image stabilisation for stills and movies to compensate camera shakes.
EXTENDED BATTERY LIFE: Large Z battery capacity for continued shooting sessions.
PROFESSIONAL VIDEOMAKING: Full-pixel readout with no pixel binning for high-resolution 4K HDR movie recording.
